Importance of Freelancing Professional Certification for Experts

Validation of Skills and Expertise: Obtaining the Freelancing Professional Certification validates a freelancer's skills, knowledge, and expertise in their chosen field. Certified freelancers can showcase their proficiency, earning the trust of potential clients and standing out in a competitive market.


Boost in Credibility and Reputation: The certification acts as a symbol of excellence, reinforcing the freelancer's credibility and reputation. Clients are more likely to hire certified professionals, as they are assured of receiving high-quality work and a seamless experience.


Ethical Standards and Best Practices: The certification program emphasizes ethical conduct, equipping freelancers with guidelines on client interactions, data security, fair billing practices, and avoiding conflicts of interest. Adhering to these standards not only enhances professionalism but also fosters long-term client relationships.


Increased Earning Potential: Certified professionals often command higher rates compared to non-certified freelancers. Clients are willing to pay a premium for quality work, and the certification becomes a compelling reason to choose certified experts.


Access to Exclusive Opportunities: Many clients prefer certified freelancers due to their proven expertise and adherence to ethical standards. This opens doors to exclusive projects and collaborations that may not be accessible to non-certified freelancers.


Importance of Freelancing Professional Certification for Clients

Trust and Reliability: For clients, hiring a certified freelancer offers a sense of security and trust. They can be confident that the certified professional possesses the necessary skills and knowledge to deliver exceptional results.


Quality Assurance: The certification assures clients that the freelancer is committed to maintaining a high standard of work. It reduces the risk of subpar deliverables, saving clients time and resources.


Ethical Engagement: Certified freelancers are more likely to uphold ethical standards and deliver projects with integrity. Clients can rest assured that their project requirements will be met with fairness and honesty.


Ease of Decision Making: With a plethora of freelancers available, clients often face the challenge of selecting the right candidate for their projects. A certification program simplifies this process, providing clients with a reliable criterion for evaluation.


Increased Collaboration Opportunities: By engaging certified professionals, clients become part of a network that fosters excellence and ethical practices. This facilitates potential long-term collaborations with freelancers who consistently meet expectations.


Freelancing as a Foundation for Building Businesses and Self-Employment

The freelancing topic is instrumental in building businesses and fostering self-employment due to several key reasons:


Specialized Skills: Freelancers often possess highly specialized skills, enabling them to provide tailored solutions to businesses. Their expertise can complement existing teams and fill knowledge gaps.


Cost-Effectiveness: Businesses can tap into freelance talent without incurring the overhead costs associated with hiring full-time employees. This cost-effectiveness allows companies to allocate resources strategically and remain agile in a dynamic market.


Flexibility: For entrepreneurs and startups, freelancers offer the flexibility to scale up or down based on project requirements. This adaptability allows businesses to respond quickly to changing demands and market conditions.


Access to Global Talent: Freelancing transcends geographical barriers, giving businesses access to a diverse talent pool from around the world. This enables companies to collaborate with top-notch professionals, regardless of their physical location.


Innovation and Creativity: Freelancers often bring fresh perspectives and innovative ideas to projects. Their creative approach can lead to breakthrough solutions that drive business growth.


The "Freelancing Professional Certification" program is a valuable asset for both experts and clients in the freelancing ecosystem. By validating skills, promoting ethical conduct, and fostering credibility, the certification enhances the freelancing experience for all stakeholders. Furthermore, the freelancing topic serves as a foundation for businesses to access specialized expertise, scale their operations efficiently, and drive innovation, while empowering individuals to pursue fulfilling self-employment opportunities in the digital age.

courseDetails.title: Angular, de gatinho a fera!

courseDetails.longDescription:
Angular é um framework, como alguns dizem "opinado".

Diferente dos seus concorrentes, como Vue e React, esse tem todo um ambiente. Esse ambiente vem acompanhado de muitos recursos, entre esses:


  1. "Bootstrap" -> Angular material;

  2. Servidor -> Angular Universal;

  3. Compatibilidade com ambientes JavaScript -> Angular Elements;

  4. Banco de Dados -> Firebase;

  5. Artificial Intelligence -> TensorFlow.js pode ser facilmente incorporado no Angular

  6. Outros: como rotas;

Como dizem alguns: Angular já vem com baterias inclusas. :)


Por que tantas pessoas ainda não adotaram o Angular?


Acho que por falta de informação mesmo. Como desenvolvedor, vi muitos mitos rodando quando comecei, entre eles:

  1. Angular não pode ser usado por startups e grupos pequenos - mito;

  2. Typescript colocar gasolina na fogueira - mito;

  3. Angular é lento - mito;

  4. Angular é similar ao React, contudo mais complicado mito;

Neste cursos, aceitei o desafio de depois de 3 anos trabalhando com Angular, ensinar!

Vamos usar um dos primeiros livros que li, mas não vamos ficar restritos aos livro:

Angular Development with TypeScript, Book by Anton Moiseev and Yakov Fain


Este é um curso dinâmico: o curso será desenhado ao longo do tempo.

Ver (lançamento oficial): "Angular, de gatinho a fera! aula aberta #1" no YouTube.

Lives serão feitas no YouTube, que podem ser usadas para decidir se compra o cursos ou mesmo desenhar o cursos junto com o professor.


Com essa forma de lançar, espero:

  1. Tem um contato mais forte com o aluno, evitando de lançar em blocos sem feedback;

  2. Adaptar ao aluno;

  3. Aprender com as demandas do aluno;

  4. Lançar um cursos com cuidado e zelo, com paciência;

Lives serão feitas no YouTube, que podem ser usadas para decidir se compra o cursos ou mesmo desenhar o cursos junto com o professor.


Bons estudos!

Learning about project management and earning a certification can benefit students in several ways.


First, project management is a widely recognized profession that offers excellent career prospects. Third, a certification in project management provides individuals with a competitive advantage, enhancing their resume and making them more attractive to potential employers.


Assessing the knowledge of individuals in project management is important to ensure that they have the necessary skills and expertise to manage projects effectively. It also helps organizations to identify knowledge gaps and provide targeted training and development programs to address those gaps. Additionally, it ensures that individuals with a project management certification have the knowledge and skills required to meet the demands of their job responsibilities and drive successful project outcomes.


Project management assessment is a critical tool for individuals and organizations alike to ensure that they have the necessary skills and expertise to manage projects effectively. courseDetails.title: CFEH - Fundamentos del Ethical Hacking - ExorciseThat
courseDetails.shortDescription: "Fundamentos del Hacking Ético para Principiantes: Aprende a proteger tus sistemas de forma segura"
courseDetails.longDescription:
Este curso de Fundamentos de Hacking Ético para Novatos está diseñado para proporcionar a los estudiantes una comprensión sólida de las técnicas y herramientas utilizadas en el Hacking Ético. A través de lecciones prácticas y ejercicios, los estudiantes aprenderán los fundamentos del Hacking Ético, incluyendo técnicas de penetración, análisis de vulnerabilidades y medidas de seguridad. Además, se discutirán temas importantes como la ética en el hacking y cómo evitar violar la ley. El curso está diseñado para principiantes, no se requiere experiencia previa en seguridad cibernética.

Los estudiantes aprenderán a utilizar herramientas de escaneo de vulnerabilidades y a comprender los resultados de los escaneos. También aprenderán a realizar pruebas de penetración en sistemas y redes, y a evaluar la seguridad de las aplicaciones web.

En este curso, los estudiantes también aprenderán sobre la ética en el Hacking Ético, y cómo evitar violar la ley. El curso también incluye una discusión sobre las regulaciones y las leyes que rigen el Hacking Ético, y cómo estas regulaciones pueden aplicarse a su trabajo diario.

En resumen, este curso proporciona una comprensión sólida de las técnicas y herramientas utilizadas en el Hacking Ético, junto con una discusión sobre la ética y la legalidad en el campo de la seguridad cibernética. Es ideal para principiantes interesados en el Hacking Ético y en mejorar sus habilidades en seguridad cibernética.
targetAudiences: Aquellos que buscan una carrera en la ciberseguridad y quieren aprender los fundamentos del Hacking Ético.
Administradores de sistemas y de redes que desean mejorar sus conocimientos sobre cómo proteger sus sistemas de ataques cibernéticos.
Empresarios y profesionales de TI que quieren comprender mejor los riesgos de ciberseguridad y cómo proteger sus negocios.

Este curso es adecuado para cualquier persona que quiera aprender sobre el Hacking Ético y la seguridad cibernética, independientemente de su experiencia previa o educación. El curso está diseñado para ser accesible para principiantes y ofrece una gran cantidad de ejercicios prácticos y tareas para ayudar a los estudiantes a aplicar lo que aprenden.
